SEARCH
Package org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter

Class EdgeSwitch

java.lang.Object
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.core.SimEntity
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.Switch
org.cloudbus.cloudsim.network.datacenter.EdgeSwitch
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable
public class EdgeSwitch extends Switch
This class represents an Edge Switch in a Datacenter network. It interacts with other switches in order to exchange packets.
Please refer to following publication for more details:
  • Saurabh Kumar Garg and Rajkumar Buyya, NetworkCloudSim: Modelling Parallel Applications in Cloud Simulations, Proceedings of the 4th IEEE/ACM International Conference on Utility and Cloud Computing (UCC 2011, IEEE CS Press, USA), Melbourne, Australia, December 5-7, 2011.
Since:
CloudSim Toolkit 3.0
Author:
Saurabh Kumar Garg

  • Constructor Details

    • EdgeSwitch

      public EdgeSwitch(String name, int level, NetworkDatacenter dc)
      Instantiates a EdgeSwitch specifying switches that are connected to its downlink and uplink ports, and corresponding bandwidths. In this switch, downlink ports aren't connected to other switch but to hosts.
      Parameters:
      name - Name of the switch
      level - At which level the switch is with respect to hosts.
      dc - The Datacenter where the switch is connected to
